title: Describing a Life-Changing Experience
description: Write about an experience that has changed you or taught you something important.

prompt.description: Write about an experience that has had a significant impact on your life. It could be traveling somewhere, meeting someone, overcoming a challenge, or learning something new. Explain what happened, how you felt, and how this experience has changed you.
requirements: Describe what the experience was and when it happened
Explain why this experience was significant
Describe how you felt during and after the experience
Explain how this experience has changed you or what you learned
Use Present Perfect to talk about the impact on your life

exampleSentences.sentence: One of the most significant experiences in my life happened three years ago.
exampleSentences.translation: 제 인생에서 가장 의미 있는 경험 중 하나는 3년 전에 일어났어요.
exampleSentences.useCase: To introduce the experience with time reference

exampleSentences.sentence: This experience has completely changed my perspective on life.
exampleSentences.translation: 이 경험은 제 인생관을 완전히 바꿔놓았어요.
exampleSentences.useCase: To describe the impact using Present Perfect

exampleSentences.sentence: I have learned that challenges can lead to personal growth.
exampleSentences.translation: 저는 도전이 개인적 성장으로 이어질 수 있다는 것을 배웠어요.

exampleSentences.sentence: Before this experience, I had never believed I could achieve so much.
exampleSentences.translation: 이 경험 전에는 제가 그렇게 많은 것을 이룰 수 있다고 믿지 않았어요.

exampleSentences.sentence: Since then, I have become more confident and open-minded.
exampleSentences.translation: 그 이후로 저는 더 자신감 있고 열린 마음을 가지게 됐어요.
exampleSentences.useCase: To describe ongoing change since the experience

exampleSentences.sentence: Looking back, I realize how much I have grown as a person.
exampleSentences.translation: 돌이켜보면, 저는 사람으로서 얼마나 성장했는지 깨달아요.

vocabularyHelp.example: It was a significant moment in my life.
This changed my perspective on work.
I had to overcome many difficulties.
I am grateful for this experience.
I realized how strong I could be.
It was a valuable learning experience.

usefulExpressions.example: One of the most challenging experiences I've had was...

usefulExpressions.usage: To describe change from a point in time
usefulExpressions.example: Since then, I have become more patient.
Looking back, I realize how important it was.
This experience taught me that anything is possible.

usefulExpressions.expression: If I hadn't..., I wouldn't have...
usefulExpressions.example: If I hadn't taken that risk, I wouldn't have discovered my passion.

items: Did you describe what the experience was?
Did you explain when it happened?
Did you describe how you felt?
Did you explain how it changed you?
Did you include what you learned?
Did you use Present Perfect for lasting effects?
Did you use Past Simple for specific events?
Did you organize your writing logically?
Did you use varied vocabulary for describing experiences?
Did you use appropriate expressions for reflection?
Did you use connecting words effectively?
Is your writing at least 120 words?
Is your writing no more than 180 words?
Does your writing have a clear introduction and conclusion?
Did you complete within the time limit?
